raw.format: html .. force a line break in html output (blank lines needed here)
html .. force a blank line in html output (blank lines needed here)

document.comment: These are replacement strings for non-ASCII characters used within the project using the same name as the html entity names (e.g., ©) for that character
document.paragraph: Seawolf, Thorin, Ashen-Shugar, Kale, Lensman, Morgan, Odin, Kage, Ambrosia, Rook
